articles.author: Emma Partridge
articles.title: Missing Sydney woman Melissa Caddick allegedly misused $13 million of clients' money to fund lavish lifestyle - 9News
articles.description: Melissa Caddick vanished from her home in Sydney's eastern suburbs on November 12 and has not been seen since.
